scripts.build: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=102400 buildType=ce,SQLE vite build
scripts.build:ee: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=102400 buildType=ee,SQLE vite build
scripts.build:demo: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=102400 buildType=ce,SQLE,DEMO vite build
